name: BoundedUIX (djsime1's fork)
description: Makes UIX elements selectable and editable with the usual Slot gizmos and fixes UIX elements breaking when a parent is inserted. Fork of Banane9's BoundedUIX.

1.1.2.changelog:
Added:
- A mod section header in RectTransform inspectors.

Updated:
- Changed the mod ID from Banane9.BoundedUIX to je.dj.BoundedUIX for the RML mod manifest.

Built against Resonite version 2025.3.28.1172.
